current.name: the Oracle1

value.en-US:
<Images>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna1.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>left</Alignment>
					<Index>1</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">AUTO GRIND, DOSE & TAMP</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Fully-integrated conical burr grinder automatically grinds, doses and tamps 22 grams of coffee straight into the portafilter.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna2.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>right</Alignment>
					<Index>2</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">PRECISE ESPRESSO EXTRACTION</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Dual stainless steel boilers and heated group head controlled by digital temperature control (PID), brings water to precisely the right temperature to extract maximum flavor potential.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna3.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>left</Alignment>
					<Index>3</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">MICRO-FOAM MILK TEXTURING</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Self-cleaning steam wand, powered by a dedicated boiler, textures milk to your liking and delivers Barista-quality micro-foam that enhances flavor and is essential for creating latte art. Allows you to adjust the milk temperature and texture to suit  your taste.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-carousel2.jpg</URL>
					<Type>carousel</Type>
					<Alignment/>
					<Index>1</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles/>
					<Descriptions/>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes990-the-oracle-touch/bes990bss1bca1/images/BES990BSS1BUS1-the-oracle-touch-beverages-espresso-carousel5.jpg</URL>
					<Type>carousel</Type>
					<Alignment/>
					<Index>2</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US">Accessories that belong to the Oracle.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles/>
					<Descriptions/>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-carousel3.jpg</URL>
					<Type>carousel</Type>
					<Alignment/>
					<Index>3</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles/>
					<Descriptions/>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna4.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>right</Alignment>
					<Index>4</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US">Close up of the control buttons for single or double shot.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">FLEXIBLE SHOT CONTROL</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Choose between one shot, two shots or manual control over how much espresso ends up in your cup for the perfect dose every time.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna5.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>left</Alignment>
					<Index>5</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US">LCD display showing the settings.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">LCD DISPLAY</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">LCD provides you all the information you need to make coffee exactly the way you like it, everytime.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna6.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>right</Alignment>
					<Index>6</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US">Close up of the Americano size and strength button.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">ONE TOUCH AMERICANO</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">The innovative One Touch Americano feature delivers a double espresso, and then separately through a dedicated spout, fills the cup with hot water, the same way as any good commercial machine.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
			</Images>

<Videos>
				<Video>
					<VideoAltTexts>
						<VideoAltText language="en_US">Make a perfectly balanced latte in under a minute with the Oracle.</VideoAltText>
					</VideoAltTexts>

				<Video>

						<VideoAltText language="en_US">Never settle for average coffee at home again thanks to Third Wave Specialty Coffee.</VideoAltText>

en-US.name: Capacity
en-US.value: Bean Hopper Capacity: 1/2 lb. Water Tank Capacity: 84 oz.

en-US.name: Settings
en-US.value: Adjustable Grind Control. Programmable Milk Temperature and Texture. One Two Shots. Long Black. Hot Water.

value.en-US:
{
"name" : "Accessories"
"value" : "Included Accessories:
Mini Grinds Bin.
58mm Full Stainless Steel Portafilter.
1 cup & 2 cup Single Wall Filter Baskets.
16oz Stainless Steel Milk Jug. 
Steam Wand Spare Parts.
Cleaning Kit. 
Water Hardness Test Strip.
Water Filter Holder and Water Filter."
}

					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US">Close up of the control buttons for single or double shot.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">FLEXIBLE SHOT CONTROL</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Choose between one shot, two shots or manual control over how much espresso ends up in your cup for the perfect dose every time.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>

					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna5.jpg</URL>

					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">LCD DISPLAY</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">LCD provides you all the information you need to make coffee exactly the way you like it, everytime.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna6.jpg</URL>

						<AltText language="en_US">Close up of the Americano size and strength button.</AltText>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">ONE TOUCH AMERICANO</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">The innovative One Touch Americano feature delivers a double espresso, and then separately through a dedicated spout, fills the cup with hot water, the same way as any good commercial machine.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
			</Images>

current.name: the Oracle-4

value.en-US:
<Images>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna1.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>left</Alignment>
					<Index>1</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">AUTO GRIND, DOSE & TAMP</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Fully-integrated conical burr grinder automatically grinds, doses and tamps 22 grams of coffee straight into the portafilter.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna2.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>right</Alignment>
					<Index>2</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">PRECISE ESPRESSO EXTRACTION</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Dual stainless steel boilers and heated group head controlled by digital temperature control (PID), brings water to precisely the right temperature to extract maximum flavor potential.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-dna3.jpg</URL>
					<Type>dna</Type>
					<Alignment>left</Alignment>
					<Index>3</Index>
					<Publish>true</Publish>
					<AltTexts>
						<AltText language="en_US"/>
					</AltTexts>
					<Titles>
						<Title language="en_US">MICRO-FOAM MILK TEXTURING</Title>
					</Titles>
					<Descriptions>
						<Description language="en_US">Self-cleaning steam wand, powered by a dedicated boiler, textures milk to your liking and delivers Barista-quality micro-foam that enhances flavor and is essential for creating latte art. Allows you to adjust the milk temperature and texture to suit  your taste.</Description>
					</Descriptions>
				</Image>
				<Image>
					<URL>https://www.breville.com/content/dam/breville/us/assets/espresso/finished-goods/bes980-the-oracle/bes980xl-the-oracle/images/BES980XL-the-oracle-beverages-espresso-carousel2.jpg</URL>
